page.title: 12TRADE: Shopping - Waterloo
page.content: {Waterloo}is a busy shopping centre. Lodge's has its main warehouse there, and a large superstore which was converted from a cinema. We carried out a survey of 30 people. This is what we found:{Use of shops:} Daily 9, Weekly 7, Sometimes 14. Nine types of shop were used by people in the survey. All thirty were satisfied with the range and 24 could not think of any improvements to be made. {Lodge's} Frank Lodge began by selling candles on the local market. Now there are 8 supermarkets plus the main warehouse, altogether employing 225 people. The warehouse has an area of 30 000 sq ft, the goods are stored in pallets and a record is kept. The superstore sells a full range of products, and best sellers include cereals, cheese, sausages, baked beans, bread and potatoes.
